edu.grinnell.glimmer.ushahidi

Class UshahidiWebClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.grinnell.glimmer.ushahidi.UshahidiWebClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UshahidiClient

    public class UshahidiWebClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements UshahidiClient
    An Ushahidi client that gets in data from the Web. The most typical form of Ushahidi client.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UshahidiWebClient(java.lang.String server)
      Create a new client that connects to server to obtain data.
      UshahidiWebClient(java.lang.String server, int numIncidents)
      Create a new client that connects to server to obtain up to numIncidents incidents.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Fetch the next set of incidents from the server.

      Get all of the incidents associated with this instance.
      boolean hasMoreIncidents()
      Determine if any unseen incidents remain.
      UshahidiIncident nextIncident()
      Get the next unseen incident.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UshahidiWebClient

        public UshahidiWebClient(java.lang.String server)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a new client that connects to server to obtain data.
        Parameters:
        server - A string that gives the prefix of the URL, including the protocol and the hostname. For example, https://farmersmarket.crowdmap.com/
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when we cannot connect to the server.
        Preconditions:
        The constructor must be a valid URL for an Ushahidi server.
        Postconditions:
        The server is available for obtaining values.

      • UshahidiWebClient

        public UshahidiWebClient(java.lang.String server,
                 int numIncidents)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a new client that connects to server to obtain up to numIncidents incidents.
        Parameters:
        server - A string that gives the prefix of the URL, including the protocol and the hostname. For example, https://farmersmarket.crowdmap.com/
        numIncidents - The number of incidents we grab from the server, more or less. Must be a non-negative integer.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when we cannot connect to the server.
        Preconditions:
        The constructor must be a valid URL for an Ushahidi server.
        Postconditions:
        The server is available for obtaining values.

    • Method Detail

      • fetchIncidents

        public int fetchIncidents()
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Fetch the next set of incidents from the server.
        Returns:
        n, The number of incidents fetched
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If we cannot get incidents from the server, or if any of the incidents is malformed.
        Preconditions:
        This object has been initialized.
        Postconditions:
        This object now contains up to numIncidents additional incidents. (It will be fewer than numIncidents if the server provides fewer.)

      • getIncidents

        public UshahidiIncident[] getIncidents()
        Description copied from interface: UshahidiClient
        Get all of the incidents associated with this instance.

        getIncidents in interface UshahidiClient

      • nextIncident

        public UshahidiIncident nextIncident()
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Get the next unseen incident.
        Specified by:
        nextIncident in interface UshahidiClient
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If no incidents remain.
